body.name: Mini Projector, PVO Portable Projector for Cartoon, Kids Gift, Outdoor Movie Projector, LED Pico Video Projector for Home Theater Movie Projector with HDMI USB Interfaces and Remote Control
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 47 mins
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 17 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 17 hrs 17 mins
features: ☀ Gift for Children: Mini projector is a must-have product for children to watch cartoons and videos, which is very popular with children. When viewed from a distance with a projector, it can project a maximum of 170 inches (Recommended 50-100 inches). Keeping children away from mobile phones and iPads can protect children's eyes.

☀ Small and Portable: Mini video projector is small and portable, and can be carried in a pocket or bag. Even children can hold it easily. You can enjoy movies, videos and games no matter at home or in the outdoor courtyard, travel, camping and other location.

☀ Upgrade Performance: PVO YG300Pro upgraded in 2023, support 1080P full HD and the natural resolution have increased to 800*480. Improve the brightness and color saturation of the projected picture to make the picture clearer and more comfortable (dark room is better).

☀ Multiple Interface: Small projector is equipped with multiple ports, including HDMI, USB, audio and other interfaces. It can be easily connected to multiple media devices, such as TV boxes, laptops, desktop computers, digital cameras, HDMI-enabled devices to play video, TV series, photos sharing and games etc.(Some devices require additional to HDMI adapter, not included.) No wifi, no bluetooth. If you don't know how to connect, please contact our customer service.

☀ Power Bank supply: The mini portable projector is powered by a power adapter (does not have a built-in battery), It can also be powered by mobile phone charger, car charger or power pack via micro-USB interface (need to support 5V/2.5A), enjoy anytime, anywhere!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 10,089 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The projector can be understood as a TV or computer monitor. Whether the electronic device (such as phone) can successfully connect to the projector, not controlled by our projector, but controlled by electronic device (such as phone) and to HDMI adapter cable. If there is any problem with the projector, please feel free to contact our CS, we will give you a satisfactory solution. Below are some screenshots of the reviews of customers after successful connection. (Can be found in the product reviews.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleased with my purchase! 😊
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. As the title says, I am very pleased with my purchase. I have a loft bed (desk at the bottom with a bed on top), and whenever I would try to relax in bed and watch TV, I would have to look down since my TV is lower than my bed. One day I realized I had this large, blank area on my white wall that would be perfect for a projector. I finally decided on this projector and don't regret it at all. First off, it's super cute. I like the simple, clean design and bright pop of color makes me happy just looking at it(: It's also surprisingly tiny. I've never traveled with it, but can imagine its size being very convenient when traveling and making it very portable. Don't let the size fool you, though. This tiny projector packs a punch. The image is extremely clear and the sound that comes out of this small appliance is also shockingly powerful coming from such a small package. Not sure what else I can say about it. It's good quality. Good image, good sound, convenient size, and cute design. I regret not getting this sooner and if you're on the search for a projector, I can happily recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a good price and a great find. Quality is great. Good size for carrying on vacation. Good clairity. Works anywhere. No issues.Highly recommend !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cool Product; Slight Issue
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this projector for about 10 months and use it to watch TV on my bed since I don’t have a TV in my room. It works great when I watch shows on my ceiling. However, theres a weird mark on the top right of my projector. I can’t clean the projector enough to get rid of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lot of power is this little book-sized projector
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this projector as a Christmas present after going to a kid birthday party where they used one. The idea was that this would be a gift for the whole family, and that we would use it in two different ways: 1. We could use it indoors for an enhanced movie-watching experience. 2. When the good days return, we could also plug in it for outdoor use in the backyard with an even bigger crowd.So far, we’ve only been able to enjoy the projector for indoor use (it’s winter!), but it was remarkably easy to set up, the sound was actually much better than I expected, and the image was really good quality just on a simple white sheet hanging off some shelves. My husband is usually quite picky when it comes to technology, and he was just as excited as the kids about this addition to our house. Overall, I am extremely happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s okay for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use, work fast. Not great quality of image but works for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The smallest and most portable projector I have ever met
reviews.reviewText: As I wrote with the title, this is the smallest and most portable projector I have ever met. The color yellow itself is lively, compared to other products with white or black body. The instruction is easy to read and follow, one thing that disappoints me is that it doesn’t have Bluetooth function, and I have to carry extra HDMI with type c to connect with my laptop, but the price itself is reasonable. Would like to recommend to others!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Brought the PVO mini projector a few months ago to use for work and it’s very compact, handy and easy to use. The picture quality is great for the price. Highly recommend getting this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by this product. Getting it all set up was easy. The picture was pretty clear but the room needs to be dark. I’m giving it 4 stars due to the loud fan and mediocre sound quality. Overall a nice product for the price and for portability.

It is really easy to setup and high quality for the price level. Using it for bedroom use and for camping. This projector is small and light enough that can be easily packaged into bag, the sharpness color and brightness are all good for me. Need to buy a hdmi to USB/type c converter to connect it. I am happy to have it, as the night of camping will not be boring any more~~~~

Onmogelijk scherp te stellen, foto's van PC of stick (NFTS!) blijven donker en onscherp. Goed voor kinderanimatiefilmpjes. Niet voor diavoorstellingen . Spijtig, maar voor dit geld weet je dat het niet geweldig zal zijn.

The media could not be loaded. Je recommande ce produit! Niveau qualité/prix rien a dire. Petit,léger facile a transporter et d'utilisation!! Rien à dire.L'image est net même avec un recul. Le son est bien le petit Bémol est le bruit mais une fois dans le film/musique on l'oublie...sinon si vous possédé un pied vous pouvez le visser dessous .

La qualità di questo prodotto è imbattibile per il suo prezzo.L'ho appeso personalmente alla parete della mia stanza (colore bianco) e sembra perfetto senza dover acquistare un tessuto specifico. Ha un bell'aspetto a diverse distanze. Personalmente, l'ho messo abbastanza vicino perché sembra gigantesco e mi offre un'esperienza cinematografica imbattibile.L'audio è molto buono, il che ci ha impressionato. Se sei preoccupato che il suono non provenga dalla parte anteriore, puoi collegare gli altoparlanti ma, personalmente, quando il volume è al massimo, è un suono che può essere ascoltato in tutta la stanza e non ti rendi conto da dove proviene il suono (home theater!).Ha una copertura per proteggere lo schermo e, nella parte inferiore, una specie di vite per modificare l'angolazione del proiettore e orientarlo a piacere. Tua madre non vuole vedere il tuo film alle 2 del mattino? Non preoccuparti, puoi collegare delle cuffie ad esso!È molto facile da usare, è dotato di un telecomando che lo rende ancora più comodo. È possibile utilizzare i pulsanti del proiettore (in caso di smarrimento del telecomando). Si connette facilmente al Wi-Fi (se hai FireTV non è necessario collegarlo al Wi-Fi).Abbiamo provato:- La condivisione dello schermo (diventa un lusso).- USB 2.0 da 64 GB (incredibile, ricorda che deve avere queste caratteristiche per poterlo capire).- HDMI (wow!)- FireTV (perfetto).Siamo particolarmente contenti perché tutto ciò che abbiamo provato funziona alla grande, è silenzioso, piccolo, carino e wow... un cinema in camera a un prezzo più che ragionevole. Se vuoi vivere questa esperienza, non esitare un secondo e goditi il letto, il divano, il pouf, l'amaca... popcorn... azione!E in inverno, piattaforma cinematografica, copritevi e divertitevi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great little projector for the money. Simple to use with mp4 video files on a USB stick. Files will auto play in order from USB with a decent audio output too. It's not a full blown super bright office standard projector, but it's great for home use in a semi dark room. We used it outside to project a series of Halloween clips onto our white garage door as part of our night time display.
